#id=1
#text=Last week I went to the library to get a book .
#id=2
#text=One of my friends had recommended that I read a book called The Chocolate Wars .
#id=3
#text=I went to the library Saturday afternoon .
#id=4
#text=I walked into the main area on the first floor and went to a computer terminal , where I looked up the book by its title .
#id=5
#text=The library catalog gave me a call number that identified where the book was stored .
#id=6
#text=I wrote the call number down on a little slip of paper , then I took the slip of paper and went to the shelves where the books are .
#id=7
#text=At the end of each row of book shelves , there are signs that told me which books were in that row .
#id=8
#text=I found the row where the number I was looking for was , then I looked at the numbers on the books on those shelves until I found the number that matched The Chocolate Wars .
#id=9
#text=I pulled the book off the shelf and liked the cover , so I decided I would go ahead and read it as my friend suggested .
#text=I took the book to the circulation desk and gave it to the librarian with my library card .
#text=The librarian swiped my library card through an electronic reader and told me the book would be due in two weeks .
#text=I thanked her and left the library .
